## line variable

Draws a line between `ax`<!-- -->,`ay` and `bx`<!-- -->,`by`<!-- -->, using `char` and taking the current clip rect and format into account. If `char` is not given, uses current style's `dot` char.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
line: (canvas: Canvas, ax: number, ay: number, bx: number, by: number, char?: string | number | undefined, format?: number) => void
```
